Front-End Build process

FE Build

  • GULP
  • SCSS
  • JavaScript
  • Images

Using Gulp

GULP

The FRONT END build process is created using Gulp which carries out the tasks like minification, concatenation, image optimization etc. To start with the FE Build process, you need to install the GULP. Follow the steps below to complete the set-up:

Install Node.js: Download a Node installer and run it

Navigate to your project root directory: Example: cd projects/mc-connect

Install gulp and related node-modules:

All the node-modules being used for the FE build process are listed in file /package.json. The command below will automatically install all the modules

npm install

GULP Commands

All the GULP tasks and options are managed in the file /gulpfile.js

The primary commands you will require are:

gulp
Default task. Same as 'gulp watch'

gulp watch
Watches SCSS, JS and Image files and will automatically run 'gulp' when they change

The SCSS to CSS

SCSS

File organization

Source files (in css-dev) are organised as follows:

                                                /css-dev
                                                  ├── _inc/                                      Shared SCSS Files for CUSTOM/ Pattern Library designs
                                                            ├── bootstrap                   Bootstrap Directory with SCSS code base [DO NOT EDIT]
                                                            ├── modules                      Custom modules Directory
                                                            ├── _bootstrap.scss                      Bootdstrap modules [DO NOT EDIT]
                                                            ├── _fonts.scss                              Custom Fonts
                                                            ├── _footer.scss                             Footer style
                                                            ├── _header.scss                            Header style
                                                            ├── _mobile.scss                            Mobile specific style
                                                            ├── _modules.scss                         Source file for all Custom Modues
                                                            ├── _tablets.scss                           Tablet specific styles style
                                                            ├── _variables.scss                        Custom variables
                                                  ├── temp                                     A TEMPORARY dirctory for GULP process, will automatically be cleared
                                                  ├── custom.scss                         SCSS source code for all CUSTOM/ Pattern Library designs
                                                  ├── main.scss                             SCSS source code for Vendor [Bootstrap v3.3.6]

Output:

/styles/main.css

/styles/custom.css

Font variant details

Fonts

Fonts: MarkOffcPro

File location: /css-dev/_inc/_fonts.scss

Details: Only FF Mark and Font-Awesome.

  • font-family: MarkOffc = Default MarkOffcPro Font
  • font-family: MarkOffc-b = MarkOffcPro-bold Font
  • font-family: MarkOffc-m = MarkOffcPro-medium Font
  • font-family: MarkOffc-l = MarkOffcPro-lite Font

Usage:

.bold {
    font-family: MarkOffc-b;
}

Output: This is bold text.

Fonts: FontAwesome

File location: /css-dev/_inc/_fonts.scss

Details: FontAwesome Variants.

Usage:

< i class="fa fa-question-circle-o" aria-hidden="true" ></i>

Output:

Text and Heading typography

Typography

File location: /css-dev/_inc/modules/_typography.scss

Body

Usage:

SCSS
.body {
    font-family: MarkOffc;
    font-size: 14px;
}

HTML
<body>Body Content</body>

Output: Body Content

Anchor Tag

Usage:

SCSS
                                                   .a {
                                                        font-family: MarkOffc-m;
                                                   }
                                                
HTML
<a>Anchor Tag</a>

Output: Anchor Tag

Header: H1

Usage:

SCSS
                                                   h1,
                                                   .h1 {
                                                        font-size: $header_fs;
                                                    }
                                                
HTML
<h1> Header 1 </h1>

Output:

Header 1

Header: H2

Usage:

SCSS
                                                   .h2 {
                                                        font-size: $section_header;
                                                    }
                                                
HTML
<h2> Header 2 </h2>

Output:

Header 2

Header: H3

Usage:

SCSS
                                                   .h3 {
                                                        font-size: $subhead_fs;
                                                    }
                                                
HTML
<h3> Header 3 </h3>

Output:

Header 3

Header: H4

Usage:

SCSS
                                                   .h4 {
                                                        font-size: $body_header;
                                                    }
                                                
HTML
<h4> Header 4 </h4>

Output:

Header 4

    </div>
</div>

Buttons and CTAs

Buttons

Basic Button

Usage:

SCSS
                                                .btn {
                                                    font-size: $body_text;
                                                    font-family: MarkOffc-b;
                                                    height: 44px;
                                                    margin-right: 20px;
                                                    max-width: 100%;
                                                    padding-left: 40px;
                                                    padding-right: 40px;
                                                    margin-bottom: 14px;
                                                }
                                                
HTML
                                                    <button class="btn">Button</button>

Output:

Primary Button

Usage:

SCSS
    .btn.primary {
        color: white;
        background-color: $orange;

        &:hover {
           background-color: $orange_hover;
        }
    }

HTML
    <button class="btn primary">Primary Button</button>

Output:

Secondary Button

Usage:

SCSS
    .btn.secondary {
        color: $orange;
        background-color: transparent;
        border: 1px solid $orange;
        &:hover {
            border: 1px solid $orange_hover;
            color: $orange_hover;
        }
    }

HTML
    <button class="btn secondary">Secondary Button</button>

Output:

Tertiary Button

Usage:

SCSS
.btn.tertiary {
    color: $teal;
    background-color: white;
    border: 1px solid $light_gray;
    &:hover {
        border: 1px solid $medium_light_gray;
        color: $light_teal;
    }
}

HTML
<button class="btn tertiary">Tertiary Button</button>

Output:

Primary Disabled Button

Usage:

SCSS
.btn.primary.disabled {
    color: white;
    background-color: $disabled_gray;
    cursor: auto;
}

HTML
    <button class="btn primary disabled">Primary Disabled Button</button>

Output:

Secondary Disabled Button

Usage:

SCSS
        .btn.secondary.disabled {
            color: $disabled_gray;
            border: 1px solid $light_gray;
            cursor: auto;
        }

HTML
    <button class="btn secondary disabled">Secondary disabled Button</button>

Output:

Tertiary Disabled Button

Usage:

SCSS
        .btn.tertiary.disabled {
            color: $disabled_gray;
            border: 1px solid $light_gray;
            cursor: auto;
        }

HTML
    <button class="btn tertiary disabled">Tertiary disabled Button</button>

Output:

Form and elements

Checkbox / Radio Button

Radio Buttons

Usage:

HTML
                                            
                                              <input id="option1" type="radio" name="option" value="0">
                                              <label for="option1" class="radio-label">Option 1</label>
                                              <input id="option2" type="radio" name="option" value="1">
                                              <label for="option2" class="radio-label">Option 2</label>

Output:

Disabled Radio Buttons

Usage:

HTML
                                                     
                                              <input id="option3" type="radio" name="option2" value="0" disabled="">
                                              <label for="option3" class="radio-label disabled">Option 1</label>
                                              <input id="option4" type="radio" name="option2" value="1" disabled="">
                                              <label for="option4" class="radio-label disabled">Option 2</label>

Output:

Checkboxes

Usage:

HTML
                                                     
                                              <h5 class="bold">Checkboxes</h5>
                                              <input id="check1" type="checkbox" name="check" value="check1">
                                              <label for="check1" class="checkbox-label">Checkbox 1</label>
                                              <input id="check2" type="checkbox" name="check" value="check2">
                                              <label for="check2" class="checkbox-label">Checkbox 2</label>

Output:

Disabled Checkboxes

Usage:

HTML
                                                     
                                             <input id="check3" type="checkbox" name="check" value="check1" checked="" disabled="">
                                              <label for="check3" class="checkbox-label disabled">Checkbox 1</label>
                                              <input id="check4" type="checkbox" name="check" value="check2" disabled="">
                                              <label for="check4" class="checkbox-label disabled">Checkbox 2</label>
                                            
                                              <hr/>

Output:

Inputs

Input Standard

Usage:

HTML
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                  <label for="example1">Input Standard</label>
                                                  <input type="text" class="form-control placeholder="Enter Text Here" input-standard" id="example1">
                                          </div>

Output:

Input Disabled

Usage:

HTML
                                            
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                                    <label class="disabled" for="example2">Input Disabled</label>
                                                    <input type="text" class="form-control input-standard disabled"
                                                     placeholder="Disabled Text" id="example2" disabled="">
                                          </div>

Output:

Input Password

Usage:

HTML
                                            
                                        <div class="form_rightcol_wrapper">

                                        <input class="input-standard" type="password" placeholder="Enter Password"">								
                                        </div>

Output:

Input Text Area

Usage:

HTML
                                            
                                        <div class="form-input-wrapper"> 

                                        <textarea class="input-standard"><textarea>								
                                        </div>

Output:

Input Error

Usage:

HTML
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                          <label for="example3">Input Error</label>
                                          <input type="text" class="form-control input-standard" data-status="error" id="example3">
                                          <img src="images/error_icon.png" class="input-text-icon">
                                          <span class="input-text-error">Loren Ipsum error</span>
                                      </div>

Output:

Loren Ipsum error

Dropdown

Usage:

HTML
                                            <div class="form-group">
                                            <label>Drop Down Lable </label> 

                                            <select>

                                            <option value="1">What is your mother's maiden name? </option>

                                            <option value="1">What is the name of your first pet? </option>

                                            <option value="1">What was your high school mascot? </option>

                                            </select>	
                                            </div>

Output:

Progress Bar

Usage:

HTML
                                                    <div id="pwdStrength" style = "position:relative;" class="password-strength">

                                                    Password Strength: <span class="blue">Good</span>

                                                    <div class="progress">
                                                    <div class="progress-bar blue" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="60" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 75%;">
                                                    </div>
                                                    </div>
                                                    </div>

Output:

Password Strength: Good

Customized and Font-Awesome icons

Sprite Based Vector Icons

Logo Icon

Usage:

SCSS
                                                    .sprite {
                                                            background: transparent url("#{$spriteFile}") no-repeat 0 0;
                                                    }

                                                    .icon-logo {
                                                        width: 155px;
                                                        height: 50px;
                                                        background-position: -345px -257px;
                                                    }
                                            
HTML
                                                <div class="sprite icon-logo">Logo Icon</div>

Output:

Contact Icon

Usage:

SCSS
                                                    .sprite {
                                                            background: transparent url("#{$spriteFile}") no-repeat 0 0;
                                                    }

                                                    .icon-contact {
                                                        background-position: -57px -1px;
                                                        width: 33px;
                                                        height: 33px;
                                                    }
                                            
HTML
                                                <div class="sprite icon-contact">Contact Icon</div>

Output:

User Icon

Usage:

SCSS
                                                    .sprite {
                                                            background: transparent url("#{$spriteFile}") no-repeat 0 0;
                                                    }

                                                    .icon-user {
                                                        background-position: -92px -1px;
                                                        width: 34px;
                                                        height: 34px;
                                                    }
                                            
HTML
                                                <div class="sprite icon-user">User Icon</div>

Output:

.sprite {
    background: transparent url("#{$spriteFile}") no-repeat 0 0;
}

.icon-pending {
    background-position: -80px -64px;
    width: 20px;
    height: 21px;
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    margin-right: 5px;
}

Horizontal and Vertical Navigation

Primary Navigation

Usage: 

HTML
                                        <nav class="navbar primary-nav">
                                          <div class="container-fluid">
                                            <div class="navbar-header">
                                              <button type="button" class="navbar-toggle collapsed" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#navbar" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="navbar">
                                                <i class="fa fa-bars"></i>
                                              </button>
                                              <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">
                                                <img alt="Brand" src="../images/logo.png" class="img-responsive">
                                              </a>
                                              <p class="navbar-text brand-text">Mastercard Connect ™</p>
                                              <a href="#" class="userLink">
                                                <img src="../images/user_icon.png">
                                              </a>
                                            </div>
                                            <div id="navbar" class="navbar-right navbar-collapse collapse">
                                              <ul class="nav navbar-nav">
                                                <li><a href="#" class="active">My Apps</a></li>
                                                <li><a href="#">Store</a></li>
                                                <li><a href="#">Support</a></li>
                                                <li class="user-li">
                                                <span type="button" class="user-popover" data-container=".user-popover" data-toggle="popover" data-original-title="" title="">
                                                  Harold <i class="fa fa-caret-down"></i>
                                                </span>
                                                </li>
                                                <li><a href="#">Sign Out</a></li>
                                              </ul>
                                            </div>
                                          </div>
                                        </nav>

                                        <div id="html-popover-holder" style="display: none;">
                                          <div class="popover-container" id="user-information">

                                              <p>Harold Doe</p>

Secondary Navigation

Usage: 

HTML
                                         <nav class="navbar horizontal-nav">
                                              <div class="container-fluid">
                                                <div class="navbar-left">
                                                  <ul class="nav navbar-nav">
                                                    <li><a href="#" class="active">Company</a></li>
                                                    <li><a href="#">Users</a></li>
                                                    <li><a href="#">Orders</a></li>
                                                    <li><a href="#">Reports</a></li>
                                                  </ul>
                                                </div>
                                              </div>
                                            </nav>

Output

  • Company
  • Users
  • Orders
  • Reports

Vertical Navigation

Usage: 

HTML
                                             <div class="sidebar-nav">
                                                   <div class="navbar" role="navigation">
                                                    <ul class="nav navbar-nav">
                                                      <li class="active"><a href="#">Profile</a></li>
                                                      <li><a href="#">Access</a></li>
                                                      <li><a href="#">Order History</a></li>
                                                      <li><a href="#">Security</a></li>
                                                    </ul>
                                                  </div>
                                                </div>

Output

  • Profile
  • Access
  • Order History
  • Security

Overlays/ Info pop-ups, Modals

Model

Usage:

HTML
                                            <button type="button" class="btn primary" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#myModal">
                                              Display Modal
                                            </button>

                                            <div class="modal fade" id="myModal" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="myModalLabel">
                                              <div class="modal-dialog" role="document">
                                                <div class="modal-content">
                                                  <div class="modal-body">
                                                    <h2>Dialog Modal Title</h2>
                                                    <p>Details - Mastercard Connect</p>
                                                    <button class="btn primary" data-dismiss="modal">Primary CTA</button>
                                                  </div>
                                                </div>
                                              </div>
                                            </div>

Output:

Dialog Modal Title

Details - Mastercard Connect

HTML
                                            <span type="button" class="user-popover" data-container=".user-popover" data-toggle="popover" data-original-title="" title="">Harold <i class="fa fa-caret-down"></i>
                                            </span>
                                              <div id="html-popover-holder" style="display: none;">
                                                  <div class="popover-container" id="user-information">
                                                    <div class="col-md-7 user-description">
                                                      <p>Harold Doe</p>
                                                      <p>Bank of swipe and smile</p>
                                                      <p>harold.doe@bankofswipeandsmile.com</p>
                                                      <p>123-456-7890</p>

                                                      <p class="signed-in">Signed in: 09 Dec 2015, 11:58pm</p>
                                                      <button class="btn secondary">Delete Account</button>
                                                    </div>

                                                    </div>

Responsive Tables

Table - With checkbox

Usage:

 HTML
                                            <table class="responsive-table tblFiltered tblcheckFilltered" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Table" border="0">
                                                <thead>
                                                    <tr>
                                                        <th scope="col"></th>
                                                        <th scope="col"><span>Order</span><i class="toggle-icon fa fa-caret-down"></i></th>  
                                                        <th scope="col" class="toggleItem">Item</th>
                                                        <th scope="col">User ID</th>
                                                        <th scope="col">Name</th>
                                                        <th scope="col">Company</th>
                                                        <th scope="col">Type</th>
                                                    </tr>
                                                </thead>

                                <table class="responsive-table" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Table" border="0">
                                        <thead>
                                            <tr>
                                                <th scope="col" onclick="sort_table(userData, 0, asc1); asc1 *= -1; asc2 = 1; asc3 = 1;"><span>Relationship</span><i class="toggle-icon fa fa-caret-down"></i></th>
                                                <th onclick="sort_table(userData, 1, asc2); asc2 *= -1; asc3 = 1; asc1 = 1;">Company Name</th>
                                                <th><span>Comapny ID</span></th>  
                                            </tr>
                                         </thead>
                                          <tbody>
                                                <tr>
                                                    <td data-title="Relationship"><span class="dataSpan">Administrative partner</span></td>
                                                    <td data-title="Comapny Name"><span>Hockenberry Holdings</span></td>
                                                    <td data-title="Company ID"><span>234567</span></td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                    <td data-title="Relationship"><span class="dataSpan">Service provider</span></td>
                                                    <td data-title="Company Name"><span>Quick Processor</span></td>
                                                    <td data-title="Comapny ID"><span>234567</span></td>
                                                </tr>

Tab structure

Tabs

Usage: 

HTML
<!-- Nav Tabs -->
<div class="inner_mcc_form">
    <ul class="nav nav-tabs secondary-tabbed-nav" role="tablist">
        <li role="presentation" class="active">
            <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#actiontab1" aria-controls="actiontab1" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 1</span>
        </li>
        <li role="presentation">
            <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#actiontab2" aria-controls="actiontab2" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 2</span>
        </li>
        <li role="presentation">
            <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#actiontab3" aria-controls="actiontab3" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 3</span>
        </li>
        <li role="presentation">
            <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#actiontab4" aria-controls="actiontab4" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 4</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>

<!-- Nav Tabs Panel -->
<div class="tab-content secondary-navigation-tab-panel tab-content-mobile">
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane active" id="actiontab1">
        <div class="suggestedPanel">
            <h3 class="mobile-tab-label mobile-tab-panel hide-desktop">Action 1</h3>
            <p>Action 1 Content</p>
       </div>
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="actiontab2">
        <div class="suggestedPanel">
            <h3 class="mobile-tab-label mobile-tab-panel hide-desktop">Action 2</h3>
            <p>Action 2 Content</p>
       </div>
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="actiontab3">
        <div class="suggestedPanel">
            <h3 class="mobile-tab-label mobile-tab-panel hide-desktop">Action 3</h3>
            <p>Action 3 Content</p>
       </div>
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="actiontab4">
        <div class="suggestedPanel">
            <h3 class="mobile-tab-label mobile-tab-panel hide-desktop">Action 4</h3>
            <p>Action 4 Content</p>
       </div>
    </div>
</div>

Output

  • Action 1
  • Action 2
  • Action 3
  • Action 4

Action 1

Action 1 Content

Action 2

Action 2 Content

Action 3

Action 3 Content

Action 4

Action 4 Content

Tab structure

Tabs -> Steps

Usage: 

HTML
<!-- Tab Steps -->
<ul class="js-tabs nav nav-tabs secondary-tabbed-nav tab-steps" role="tablist">
    <li role="presentation" class="active">
        <span class="mobile-tab-label active" data-target="#action1" aria-controls="action1" role="tab" data-toggle="tab"></span>
        <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#action1" aria-controls="action1" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 1</span>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
        <span class="mobile-tab-label inactive" data-target="#action2" aria-controls="action2" role="tab" data-toggle="tab"></span>
        <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#action2" aria-controls="action2" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 2</span>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
        <span class="mobile-tab-label inactive" data-target="#action3" aria-controls="action3" role="tab" data-toggle="tab"></span>
        <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#action3" aria-controls="action3" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 3</span>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation">
        <span class="mobile-tab-label inactive" data-target="#action4" aria-controls="action4" role="tab" data-toggle="tab"></span>
        <span class="desktop-tab-label" data-target="#action4" aria-controls="action4" role="tab" data-toggle="tab">Action 4</span>
    </li>
</ul>

<!-- Tab Steps Panel -->
<div class="tab-content secondary-navigation-tab-panel">
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane active" id="action1">
        <h3 class="mobile-tab-label">Action 1</h3>
        <p>Action 1 Content</p>
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="action2">
        <h3 class="mobile-tab-label">Action 2</h3>
        <p>Action 2 Content</p>
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="action3">
        <h3 class="mobile-tab-label">Action 3</h3>
        <p>Action 3 Content</p>
    </div>
    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="action4">
        <h3 class="mobile-tab-label">Action 4</h3>
        <p>Action 4 Content</p>
    </div>
</div>

Output

  • Action 1
  • Action 2
  • Action 3
  • Action 4

Action 2

Action 3

Tree structure/ Collapse-Expand menus

Tree

Usage:

<div class="panel panel-default">
<ol class="tree noMargin">
<li>
<input type="checkbox" id="bank1" name="bank1" value="bank1">
<label for="bank1" class="checkbox-label">Bank of Swipe and Smil [123456]</label>
  <ol class="tree-toggle">
      <li>
        <ol class="tree-toggle">
          <li class="file">
            <input id="unrestricted" type="radio" name="check" value="unrestricted">
            <label for="unrestricted" class="radio-label">Manage users and all orders (unrestricted)</label>
          </li>
          <li class="file">
            <input id="restricted" type="radio" name="check" value="restricted">
            <label for="restricted" class="radio-label">Manage orders for selected accounts (restricted)...</label>
              <ol>
                <li class="file">
                    <input id="checkICA1" type="checkbox" name="check" value="3107713">
                    <label for="checkICA1" class="checkbox-label"><span class="chips bg-green text-white">ICA</span> 125472</label>
                  </li>
                  <li class="file">
                    <input id="checkICA2" type="checkbox" name="check" value="31081225">
                    <label for="checkICA2" class="checkbox-label"><span class="chips bg-green text-white">ICA</span> 128955</label>
                  </li>
              </ol>
          </li>                                                  

        </ol>
      </li>
    </ol>
</li>
<li>
<input type="checkbox" id="bank2" name="bank2" value="bank2">
<label for="bank2" class="checkbox-label">Bank of Tanzania [342516]</label>
</li>


</ol>
</div>

Output: [Note: Select the checkbox/Radio button to expand tree nodes]

Guidelines for Developers

Developer Notes

  1. Ensure HTML5 tag is used in the page
  2. Use of pattern library effeciently.
  3. Use proper naming convenction which follows the guidelines. All NEW classes must be class-name and not className, class_name etc.
  4. Use the Bootstrap classes for alignments, floats, push/pull effectivly over writting your own classes
  5. While writing SCSS, make sure that the style can be used globally and if so, include it in the respective less so that it is available.
  6. Ensure specific component like _support, _spotlight etc. is required and then add it to _modules.scss
  7. Ensure the TAB spacing. Add a TAB spacing with Parent - Child declarations. Ensure your code is formatted properly.
  8. Use js- prefix for all the js related classes and seperate them from the styles. Thus avoiding functional dependancy
  9. NO STYLE/ CSS should be written on a class with js-prefix
  10. Avoid SCSS/CSS nesting of more than 3 levels
  11. Make sure your styled page conforms to the minimum of 1024px and maximum of 1400px screen resolution
  12. Do not comment-out the JS/ CSS/ HTML code and commit. If Unit Testing is done clearly, remove the unwanted code before code commit.
  13. Prefer and use SVG Sprite wherever applicable.
  14. Make sure the IMPACT ASSESSMENT is done thouroughly
  15. Code commits
    1. Always start GULP WATCH before making changes to files under css-dev/ js-dev or img-dev directories.
    2. STOP the GULP/ Command prompt during the code-commit
    3. NEVER COMMIT the "node_modules" Directory to the repository
